<style>
  .hero-section {
    min-height: 90vh;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 3rem 2rem;
    max-width: 1000px;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }

  .profile-img-container {
    margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
    position: relative;
    display: inline-block;
  }

  .profile-img-centered {
    width: 200px;
    height: 200px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    background: linear-gradient(145deg, #1e293b, #0f172a);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    
    /* Protrude Button Effect (Neumorphism-inspired for dark mode) */
    box-shadow: 
      10px 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5),
      -5px -5px 15px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05),
      inset 0 0 0 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
      
    transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
    padding: 10px; /* Space for the background color to show around the edges if desired */
  }

  .profile-img-centered:hover {
    transform: scale(1.03) translateY(-8px);
    border-color: rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.5);
    box-shadow: 
      15px 20px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6),
      -5px -5px 20px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1);
  }

  .hero-badge {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #d946ef);
    border: none;
    color: white;
    font-weight: 800;
    padding: 0.8rem 2rem;
    border-radius: 999px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.2);
    
    /* Repeating Animation - Pronounced 'climb' from bottom */
    animation: floatUpRepeat 7s ease-in-out infinite;
  }

  @keyframes floatUpRepeat {
    0% {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(100px) scale(0.95);
      filter: blur(8px);
    }
    30% {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
      filter: blur(0);
    }
    90% {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0) scale(1);
    }
    91%, 100% {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }
  }

  .hero-badge strong {
    color: #f8fafc;
  }

  .hero-title {
    font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 8vw, 4.8rem);
    font-weight: 900;
    line-height: 1.1;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    color: #f8fafc;
  }

  .hero-description {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    line-height: 1.8;
    color: #94a3b8;
    margin-bottom: 3.5rem;
    max-width: 800px;
  }

  .tech-stack {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 1.2rem;
    margin-bottom: 4.5rem;
  }

  .tech-item {
    font-weight: 600;
    padding: 0.6rem 1.4rem;
    border-radius: 2rem;
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    color: #e2e8f0;
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  }

  .tech-item:hover {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    border-color: #3b82f6;
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  }

  .btn-hero-primary {
    background: linear-gradient(90deg, #3b82f6, #d946ef);
    border: none;
    color: white;
    padding: 1.1rem 2.8rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.3);
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .btn-hero-primary:hover {
    transform: translateY(-3px);
    box-shadow: 0 15px 35px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.4);
    color: white;
  }

  .btn-hero-secondary {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
    color: #f8fafc;
    padding: 1.1rem 2.8rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    text-decoration: none;
    backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  }

  .btn-hero-secondary:hover {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
    border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    transform: translateY(-3px);
    color: #f8fafc;
  }

  .social-link {
    font-size: 1.8rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    display: inline-block;
    color: #94a3b8;
  }

  .social-link:hover {
    color: #3b82f6;
    transform: translateY(-5px);
  }

  /* Animations */
  .fade-up {
    animation: fadeUp 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.22, 1, 0.36, 1) forwards;
    opacity: 0;
  }

  @keyframes fadeUp {
    from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(40px); }
    to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
  }

  .delay-0 { animation-delay: 0s; }
  .delay-1 { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
  .delay-2 { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
  .delay-3 { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
  .delay-4 { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
</style>
